Pre-Game Insights: Dorival Júnior's squad selections for the World Cup qualifiers include a significant number of Brazil-based players.
The likely starting XI for Brazil includes Alisson, Danilo, Éder Militão, Gabriel Magalhães, Guilherme Arana; André, Bruno Guimarães, Lucas Paquetá; Rodrygo, Vini Júnior, Endrick.
Brazil's disappointing quarterfinal exit from the Copa América is influencing current squad selections.
Dorival Júnior has replaced several Europe-based players with Brazil-based players, including André, Gerson, Luiz Henrique, Pedro, and Estêvão.
Dorival Júnior's squad selection suggests a shift towards Brazil-based players, possibly due to various factors such as match fitness or external pressures.
Ecuador's recent performance has been inconsistent, especially when not playing at altitude.
